description: Creates or updates a database's connection policy, which is used with table auditing. Table auditing is deprecated, use blob auditing instead.

api_version.description: The API version to use for the request.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group that contains the resource. You can obtain this value from the Azure Resource Manager API or the portal.

connection_policy_name.description: The name of the connection policy.

subscription_id.description: The subscription ID that identifies an Azure subscription.

database_name.description: The name of the database for which the connection policy will be defined.
